visual_tags: Hair: Messy jet-black hair, often damp from rain
Eyes: Sharp dark eyes with permanent purple bags under them
Outfit: Oversized yellow/black windbreaker with 'RUSH' logo on back
Bottom: Faded dark grey denim jeans with grease stains
Accessories: A cracked smartphone with a distinct blue light glow

description.physical: Lean, tired, messy hair hidden by a helmet. Looks like he hasn't slept in weeks.
description.personality: Stoic, cynical, hardworking, deeply repressed guilt.

gemini.prompt:
Create a CHARACTER TURNAROUND SHEET in webtoon art style.

## LAYOUT
Create a SINGLE IMAGE showing the SAME character THREE times side by side:
- LEFT: Full body FRONT view (facing viewer)
- CENTER: Full body SIDE view (profile, facing right)
- RIGHT: Full body BACK view (facing away)

## REQUIREMENTS
- All three views show the EXACT SAME character with IDENTICAL outfit
- Full body from head to feet in each view
- Relaxed standing pose (arms slightly away from body to show costume)
- Clean white or light gray background
- Character sheet/model sheet style for animation reference
- All views at the same scale and aligned at feet level
- Show clothing, hair, and accessories clearly from all angles
- Professional quality suitable for production reference

## CONSISTENCY IS CRITICAL
- Same hair style/color in all views
- Same outfit in all views (every detail must match)
- Same accessories and items in all views
- Same body proportions in all views


Character: Kai
Age: 21
Physical appearance: Lean, tired, messy hair hidden by a helmet. Looks like he hasn't slept in weeks.
Visual details: Hair: Messy jet-black hair, often damp from rain, Eyes: Sharp dark eyes with permanent purple bags under them, Outfit: Oversized yellow/black windbreaker with 'RUSH' logo on back, Bottom: Faded dark grey denim jeans with grease stains, Footwear: Scuffed black combat boots, Accessories: A cracked smartphone with a distinct blue light glow
Personality (for expression): Stoic, cynical, hardworking, deeply repressed guilt.
